      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Acids and alkalis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säuren und Alkalien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acides et alcalis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ácidos e alcalóides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acidi ed alcali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οξέα και αλκάλια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ácidos y álcalis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the change in colour in hydrochloric acid, lemonade, sodium hydroxide and water after adding red cabbage juice.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lemonade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">red cabbage juice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Änderung in der Farbe 
in der Salzsäure, in der Limonade, im Natriumhydroxid und im Wasser, 
nachdem sie Saft des roten Kohls hinzugefügt hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le changement de la 
couleur dans l'acide chlorhydrique, la citronnade, l'hydroxyde de 
sodium et l'eau après avoir ajouté le jus de chou rouge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a mudança na cor no 
ácido hydrochloric, na limonada, no hydroxide do sodium e na água 
após ter adicionado o suco do repolho vermelho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il cambiamento a 
colori in acido cloridrico, limonata, idrossido del sodio ed acqua 
dopo la aggiunta della spremuta del cavolo rosso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την αλλαγή στο χρώμα στο 
υδροχλωρικό οξύ, τη λεμονάδα, το υδροξείδιο νατρίου και το ύδωρ 
μετά από να προσθέσει το χυμό κόκκινων λάχανων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el cambio en color en 
ácido hidroclórico, limonada, hidróxido del sodio y agua después 
de agregar el jugo de la col roja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alkali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salzsäure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Limonade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saft des roten Kohls</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natriumhydroxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">alcali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">acide chlorhydrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">citronnade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jus de chou rouge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hydroxyde de sodium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">limonada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">suco do repolho vermelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hydroxide do sodium</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
